name: SummonerScrimmage
description:
A game made for the GameDevNetwork Elderberry Game Jam with the theme: Summoning. 

You control a summoner that summons beings to fight other in this mix of an action-RPG battle-platformer-bullethell. Dodge the attacks from the enemy and outlast your opponent. 

WebGL full screen isn't ideal at the moment and the keyboard inputs aren't designed well, so for a better experience try downloading the executable and playing it in full screen, and configure your own controls.

There are currently 7 different summons  to call upon, for which you can select up to 6 different summons. 

You can play versus the AI (which is enabled by default) or play against another player for local multiplayer using a single keyboard: 

Player 1: Use WASD, 1 and tilde (`)

Player 2: Use direction keys (up, down, left, right),  slash (/) and period (.)

Battle music "もう、迷わない" by YouFulca(ユーフルカ) from https://wingless-seraph.net (The music here is real AWESOME btw)

Intro music algorithmically generated http://computoser.com/

SoundFX from FreeSound.org 

Font: Apple and Euphorigenic

Clouds from this Shadertoy entry

Sprites edited and animated in Pyxeledit
